column5: Well finally some hot steamy weather for fishing on Lake Erie ...Today was a hot one ...not going to give out to much info in this post due to the Straight Lime Anglers Walleye Tourney coming up this weekend .... but fishing is  good   today we spent some a few hours of time looking for big fish and they were there gota love GPS ....so if your looking for walleye they are all over from 75 fow to 0ver 100 fow out from Port Maitland ...full tech report after sunday ..
